title: Manage Asset Operating Strategy
description: A reliability engineer is reviewing the overall maintenance and operating strategy for a critical asset to ensure it is optimized for performance and life.

tasks.description: Retrieve the asset's current maintenance plan, spare parts list, and operating procedures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all the documents that define the current strategy.

tasks.description: Analyze the asset's failure history and performance data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer reviews the historical data for trends.

tasks.description: Based on the analysis, create a recommendation to update the strategy, such as moving from time-based maintenance to condition-based maintenance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer proposes a change to the overall strategy and submits it for approval.
